description:
Long trail days call for trail shoes that back up your ambitions. The suede upper provides support and protection, while the Presa® outsole with IKS impact absorbing domes deliver exceptional traction and comfort.

  • Uppers are durable suede panels with 3D Auto-Fit collar for comfortable support
  • DST frame stabilizes feet and provides torsional rigidity
  • GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort membrane for waterproofness and breathability
  • Dual-density EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Rubber toe cap protects against stumps, rocks, and other kickable objects
  • Presa® outsole with SuperGum rubber and IKS technology absorbs shocks and grips to slippery and loose surfaces
name: Scarpa Rush Trail Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
